regen.absent_element: visual or text notification of the specific alarm type
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual or text notification on the supervisor's computer detailing the type of alarm triggered, immediately upon detection.
The system shall prioritize invalid temperature alarms over limit-exceeded alarms if both occur simultaneously.

regen.absent_element: additional notification method for alarm condition beyond audio alerts
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide a visual notification on the supervisor's computer screen in addition to audio beeps when an alarm condition is met.

label: This series of beeps shall continue until the supervisor manually resets the alarm through the supervisor's interface window.
